plugin.name: MSP_Sounds
plugin.author: Klor
plugin.purpose: Triggers to simulate MSP for LOTJ
plugin.description: This plugin requires you to enable SOUND ON and CONFIG +SOUND to operate for half of the files. You will also need the sound package file. Unzip the sound package file into your "Mushclient\sounds" directory.

trigger.send: PlaySound (1, "targetlock.wav", false, -5, 0) EnableTrigger("targetlock_sound1", false) DoAfterSpecial(5, 'EnableTrigger("targetlock_sound1", true)', sendto.script)
